text: Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran
Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran
Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan
baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:
https://www.unicef.org/coronavirus/covid-19-parenting-tips
COVID19Parenting.com
https://www.acceleratehub.org/plh-research-outputs
https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public/healthy-parenting
Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran
Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran
Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan
baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:

sourceText: Listen to them, look at them. Give them your full attention. Have fun!
text: Tande yo, gade yo. Ba yo tout atansyon w. Byen pwofite!

sourceText: Read a book or look at pictures.
text: Li yon liv oswa gade foto yo.

sourceText: Make drawings with crayons or pencils.
text: Fè desen ak kreyon yo.

sourceText: Dance to music or sing songs!
text: Danse mizik oswa chante!

sourceText: Do a chore together –  make cleaning and cooking a game!
text: Fè yon travay ansanm – fè netwayay ak fè manje tounen jwèt!
Ede ak devwa lekòl.
Ide sou sa w ka fè ak pitit ou ki jenn.

sourceText: Switch off the TV and phone. This is virus-free time.
text: Etenn televizyon an ak telefòn nan. Se yon moman ki pa gen okenn viris.

sourceText: Talk about something they like: sports, music, celebrities, friends.
text: Pale sou bagay yo renmen: spò, mizik, vedèt ak zanmi.
Kwit yon manje nou renmen anpil ansanm.

sourceText: Exercise together to their favorite music.
text: Chante mizik prefere yo ansanm avèk yo.
Kèk bagay ou ka fè ak pitit ou ki adolesan.

sourceText: Copy their facial expression and sounds.
text: Imite yo nan jès yo fè ak fiji yo ak sa yap di.

sourceText: Sing songs, make music with pots and spoons.
text: Chante kèk chante, fè mizik ak veso ak kiyè.
Anpile gode oswa blòk yo.

sourceText: Tell a story, read a book, or share pictures.
text: Rakonte yon istwa, li yon liv oswa pataje photo yo.
Ide sou sa w ka fè ak tibebe w.
Chwazi konstwi konfyans nan tet yo.

sourceText: If they want to do something that isn’t OK with physical distancing, then this is a chance to talk with them about this. (see next leaflet)
text: Si yo vle fè yon bagay ki pa posib pou w fè ak yon sèten distans fizik, lè sa a se yon posiblite pou w pale avèk yo sou sa (gade pwochen depliyan an)

sourceText: Ask your child what they would like to do.
text: Mande timoun ou yo kisa yo ta renmen fè.

sourceText: It can be for just 20 minutes, or longer – it’s up to us.
text: Se ka jis pou 20 minit, oswa plis – sa depann de nou.

sourceText: It can be at the same time each day so children or teenagers can look forward to it.
text: Sa kapab menm lè a chak jou pou timoun nan oswa adolesan an ka chofe pou sa a chak fwa.

sourceText: Set aside time to spend with each child.
text: Rezève tan pou w pase ak chak timoun.

sourceText: We can also see this as a chance to make better relationships with our children and teenagers.
text: Nou ka konsidere sa tou kòm yon posiblite pou gen pi bon relasyon ak timoun ou yo oswa pitit ou yo ki adolesan.

sourceText: One-on-One time is free and fun. It makes children feel loved and secure, and shows them that they are important.
text: Ti pale nou fè a de se yon moman ki lib e ki amizan. Sa fè timoun yo santi yo renmen l e li an sekirite, e sa fè yo santi yo enpòtan.

sourceText: Can’t go to work? Schools closed? Worried about money?
text: Ou pa ka al travay? Lekòl fèmen? Wap enkyete w parapò ak lajan?

sourceText: It is normal to feel stressed and overwhelmed.
text: Se nòmal ou santi w strese e w santi w about.
Ti pale a de
Edikasyon timoun nan peryòd Covid-19
Patnè yo
Moun ki finanse yo
